reporting.reportgraph.GraphQuery: DECLARE @GlobalManufacturers bit; SET @GlobalManufacturers = {%Settings.CMSStoreAllowGlobalManufacturers?1:0|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)fd3f138d5ba5d58490b41d2cd434e9fa27ae43d9e53e59181ba89c668e3c52c8%}; SELECT Manufacturers.ManufacturerDisplayName AS '{$manufacturerselector.itemname$}', CAST(ISNULL(ROUND(SUM(OrderItemTotalPriceInMainCurrency),1),0) AS DECIMAL(38,1)) AS '{$com.sales.volumeofsales$}' FROM COM_Manufacturer AS Manufacturers LEFT JOIN (COM_SKU AS product LEFT JOIN COM_SKU parentProduct ON product.SKUParentSKUID = parentProduct.SKUID) ON (Manufacturers.ManufacturerID = product.SKUManufacturerID OR Manufacturers.ManufacturerID = parentProduct.SKUManufacturerID) LEFT JOIN COM_OrderItem ON OrderItemSKUID = product.SKUID LEFT JOIN COM_Order ON OrderID = OrderItemOrderID WHERE (Manufacturers.ManufacturerEnabled = 1 OR (Manufacturers.ManufacturerID IN (SELECT SKUManufacturerID FROM COM_SKU WHERE SKUID IN (SELECT OrderItemSKUID FROM COM_OrderItem WHERE OrderItemOrderID IN (SELECT OrderID FROM COM_Order WHERE OrderSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID))))) AND product.SKUOptionCategoryID IS NULL AND (Manufacturers.ManufacturerSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID OR (Manufacturers.ManufacturerSiteID IS NULL AND @GlobalManufacturers = 1) ) AND OrderSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID AND (OrderDate >= @FromDate OR @FromDate IS NULL) AND (OrderDate <= dateadd(day,1,@ToDate) OR @ToDate IS NULL) AND (ISNULL(@OrderIsPaid,0) = 0 OR ISNULL(OrderIsPaid, 0) = 1) GROUP BY Manufacturers.ManufacturerDisplayName ORDER BY SUM(OrderItemTotalPriceInMainCurrency) DESC, Manufacturers.ManufacturerDisplayName
